=String Formatting=
!WinBuilder has the following string formatting capabilities :

 * [strformatINC StrFormat,[INC / DEC / MULT / DIV]]
 * [strformatFILENAME StrFormat,[FILENAME / PATH / EXT] ]
 * [strformatBYTES StrFormat,BYTES]
 * [strformatDATE StrFormat,DATE]
 * [strformatCEIL StrFormat,[CEIL / FLOOR] ]
 * [strformatLTRIM StrFormat,[LTRIM / RTRIM / CTRIM / NTRIM] ]
 * [strformatLEFT StrFormat,[LEFT / RIGHT]]
 * [strformatREPLACE StrFormat,[REPLACE / REPLACEX] ]
 * [strformatSPLIT StrFormat,SPLIT]
 * [strformatSHORTPATH StrFormat,[SHORTPATH / LONGPATH] ]
 * [strformatCHARTOOEM StrFormat,[CHARTOOEM / OEMTOCHAR] ]
 * [strformatLEN StrFormat,LEN]
 * [strformatPOS StrFormat,POS]
